item.title: How to manage Python2.X, 3.X and packages every project
item.description: Motivation want to switch major version of Python (i.e. between Python2.X and Python3.X). want to switch minor version of Python (i.e. between Python3.A and Python3.B). want to isolate some packages for every project. don’t want to construct in vain a new docker container for each Python project. How to switch any version of Python with pyenv Installation Confirm the default Python version. $ python --version Python 2.
